name: Linus Torvalds
desc: a Finnish-American software engineer, is renowned for creating the Linux kernel, pivotal in modern computing. His visionary leadership and commitment to open-source principles have shaped the digital landscape.

name: Richard Stallman
desc: Richard Stallman is a pioneering figure in the world of software freedom, best known for launching the GNU Project and advocating for free software. His work has had a profound impact on technology and society.

name: Mark ZuckerBerg
desc: Mark Zuckerberg is a tech entrepreneur who co-founded Facebook, now Meta Platforms Inc. He revolutionized social networking and digital communication, impacting billions worldwide with his innovations and vision.

name: Tim Berners Lee
desc: Tim Berners-Lee is a computer scientist who invented the World Wide Web, revolutionizing global communication. His contributions laid the foundation for the modern internet, promoting openness, accessibility, and information sharing worldwide
